subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Cyril Crutchfield, a key figure in the recovery of the peninsula below New Orleans after Hurricane Katrina, was accused of using profanity in a classroom.
snippet: Cyril Crutchfield, a key figure in the recovery of the peninsula below New Orleans after Hurricane Katrina, was accused of using profanity in a classroom.
